reviewText: Meh. Not as clear as I'd hoped.
I am very pleased w/my instructional DVD and would recommend it to anyone wanting to learn these dances.

This was the first "Best Dance" DVD that I bought but after learning these steps, I was inspired to learn more and have purchased the entire line of "Best Dance" DVD's. If your serious about learning to dance this is the DVD for you. Al and Marcia are excellent instructors and are able to communicate their years of training in a basic and easy to understand manner. After learning each step and then putting it all together for each dance, I was ready to go out and dance the night away.
